/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cuda_app.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda_app.dir/cuda_ex.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cuda_app.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib
